member.name: POLICY_AUDIT_SID_ARRAY
member.summary: The POLICY_AUDIT_SID_ARRAY structure specifies an array of structures that represent Windows users or groups.

member.name: POLICY_AUDIT_SID_ARRAY.UsersCount
member.summary: The number of structures in the UserSidArray array.

member.name: POLICY_AUDIT_SID_ARRAY.UserSidArray
member.summary: A pointer to an array of pointers to structures that specify Windows users or groups.
